clientID_desc: The ClientID that should be used for authorization.
channel_desc: The Twitch channel that should be used for events.
name: Name
prefix_desc: Text that comes before every message that the bot says.
suffix_desc: Text that comes after every message that the bot says.

redeem.rewardCost: The channel points cost of the reward.
redeem.rewardImage: The image URL of the reward.
redeem.userID: The ID of the user that redeemed the reward.
redeem.userName: The user name of the user that redeemed the reward.
redeem.userDisplayName: The display user name of the user that redeemed the reward.

raid.userName: The user name of the raider.
raid.userDisplayName: The display user name of the raider.
raid.viewerCount: The viewer count of the raider.
